credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Soldier Giving Water to a Wounded Companion
medium: Charcoal, white chalk, brush and white gouache on green wove paper, mounted on cardboard
description: Recto: Horizontal view of a soldier kneeling beside a wounded companion, holding his head, and giving him a drink from a canteen, as a third soldier stands and watches at left foreground; a faintly drawn group appears in right background.  Verso: A drill ground.
name: Drawing
